Params[3]: Here are the goods plus the "gift". And with that, my job as your agent is done.

There's nothing worse than living at the mercy of someone else. You reap what you sow. You may be inside the loop, but you never get to make choices.
Ah, well, why am I even saying this to you? After all, you're nothing more than a...
There are plenty of options this time. I know I'll find a satisfactory one.
Does that mean this ship will finally...

I am only interested in the shell. This ship exists for this sole reason.
